item.title: EXCLUSIVE: Salman Khan and Hrithik Roshan join hands for the first time onscreen for.. - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Salman Khan and Hrithik Roshan Partner for First Ever Ad Film

Published on: Dec 23, 2024 | Source: Pinkvilla

Salman Khan and Hrithik Roshan are collaborating for the first time in an action-packed advertisement for a leading brand, directed by Ali Abbas Zafar.

  • This collaboration marks the first onscreen appearance of both superstars together.
  • The advertisement will be shot in Mumbai with VFX backgrounds to enhance production value.
  • Ali Abbas Zafar and Salman Khan have previously collaborated on successful projects.
  • Official announcement regarding the collaboration is expected soon.
“After all the efforts for a big screen collaboration, it’s a corporate that got the two superstars together for an action-packed advertisement.”

This collaboration is highly anticipated by fans, with hopes of a feature film in the future.

item.title: Congress denies link to vandalism at Pushpa 2 actor Allu Arjun's residence in Hyderabad: Report - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Congress Denies Any Link to Vandalism at Allu Arjun's Residence

Date: December 23, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

The Congress party has denied allegations of involvement in the vandalism at actor Allu Arjun's residence in Hyderabad, following a stampede incident during the premiere of his film, Pushpa 2.

  • The vandalism occurred amid protests outside Allu Arjun's house in response to the Sandhya Theatre stampede incident that resulted in a woman’s death.
  • Congress spokesperson Sama Ram Mohan Reddy clarified that none of the accused are affiliated with the party.
  • Telangana CM Revanth Reddy condemned the attack and called for strict action from law enforcement.
  • Protesters identified as students from Osmania University allegedly caused damage to Allu Arjun's property.
“I condemn the attack on the homes of film celebrities. I am directing the State DGP and City Police Commissioner to take strict action regarding law and order.” - Revanth Reddy

The incident highlights ongoing tensions and the dissatisfaction among certain groups following the tragic events at the theatre.

item.title: SCOOP: Siddharth Anand takes over directorial reins of Shah Rukh Khan-Suhana Khan-Abhishek Bachchan starrer King - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
SCOOP: Siddharth Anand takes over directorial reins of Shah Rukh Khan-Suhana Khan-Abhishek Bachchan starrer King

Publication Date: Not provided Source: Bollywood Hungama

The highly anticipated film King will feature Shah Rukh Khan alongside his daughter Suhana Khan for the first time, directed by the acclaimed Siddharth Anand.

  • Siddharth Anand, known for blockbusters like War and Pathaan, will direct King.
  • The film's script is written by Sujoy Ghosh, known for Kahaani.
  • Produced by Red Chillies Entertainment and Marflix, King promises high-octane action and emotional depth.
  • Filming is set to begin in late February or early March 2025, targeting a mid-2026 release.
  • Anticipation is high for the on-screen chemistry between Shah Rukh Khan and Suhana Khan.
“As the countdown begins for the commencement of filming, King is already shaping up to be a cinematic event of epic proportions.”

With a stellar cast and an experienced director, King is poised to be one of the most awaited films in Indian cinema.

item.title: Kumar Vishwas Cites Ramayana In Veiled Dig at Shatrughan Sinha, Sonakshi: 'Teach Your Children...' - News18
item.description:
Kumar Vishwas Cites Ramayana In Veiled Dig at Shatrughan Sinha, Sonakshi: 'Teach Your Children...'

Last Updated: December 23, 2024, 17:34 IST | Source: News18

Poet Kumar Vishwas stirred controversy with a veiled reference to actor Shatrughan Sinha and his daughter Sonakshi Sinha's interfaith marriage during a public event, urging people to teach their children the 'Ramayana'.

  • Vishwas suggested in his comments that cultural teachings are essential to prevent losing family values.
  • His comments provoked a range of reactions on social media, with some criticizing him as inappropriate.
  • Congress spokesperson Supriya Shrinate rebuked Vishwas, emphasizing women's rights to make personal choices regarding marriage.
  • Sonakshi was married to actor Zaheer Iqbal in June, which is added context to Vishwas's comments.

“Kumar Vishwas ji, you not only made a cheap comment on Sonakshi Sinha’s inter-religious marriage, but you also exposed your real thinking about women…” - Supriya Shrinate

The incident exemplifies the ongoing discussion around cultural values and personal choices in Indian society.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: Siddharth Anand to direct Shah Rukh Khan, Abhishek Bachchan & Suhana Khan in King; Filming begins in March 2025 - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Siddharth Anand to Direct Shah Rukh Khan, Abhishek Bachchan & Suhana Khan in 'King'; Filming Set for March 2025

Publication Date: December 23, 2024 | Source: Pinkvilla

Siddharth Anand is set to direct Shah Rukh Khan again in the upcoming film 'King', also featuring Abhishek Bachchan and Suhana Khan, starting filming in March 2025.

  • Shah Rukh Khan previously collaborated with Siddharth Anand on the blockbuster 'Pathaan' in 2023.
  • 'Pathaan' was the first Hindi film to enter the Rs 500 crore club.
  • The film 'King' has been in preparation for six months, focusing on high-octane action sequences.
  • King is produced by Red Chillies Entertainment and features a notable cast with planned global shooting locations.
  • The film aims to have a scale comparable to 'Pathaan' and is set for a 2026 release.
“Every actor has a great arc in the screenplay of King, and they have their moments to shine.”

The collaboration between these stars is highly anticipated, promising a significant cinematic experience with action sequences aimed to meet global standards.

item.title: Jennifer Lopez ‘struggles’ being a single mom following her split with Ben Affleck - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Jennifer Lopez Discusses Challenges of Single Motherhood After Ben Affleck Split

Date: Dec 23, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Jennifer Lopez shared her experiences and challenges of raising her twins, Emme and Max, following her split from Ben Affleck in a recent interview with British Vogue.

  • Lopez describes parenting her 16-year-old twins as a "beautiful, challenging blessing."
  • She emphasizes the difficulty of being a parent, stating it's the hardest job anyone could have.
  • Lopez reflects on her emotional struggles and self-doubt as a single parent.
  • She highlights that one good parent is enough for children to feel loved and supported.
“Being a parent [is] the hardest job that anyone could ever have.”

Lopez concludes by stressing the importance of love from at least one good parent, drawing inspiration from her role in the film 'Unstoppable'.

item.title: Paatal Lok 2 release date: Here's when Jaideep Ahlawat, Ishwak Singh's hit Prime Video show will be back - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Paatal Lok 2 Release Date Announced: Set to Premiere on January 17

Publication Date: Dec 23, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

The much-anticipated second season of the critically acclaimed crime drama Paatal Lok will return on January 17, 2024. The show stars Jaideep Ahlawat and Ishwak Singh, along with new cast members Tillotama Shome and Nagesh Kukunoor.

  • The new season will continue to explore the character of Hathi Ram Chaudhary and his challenges in a treacherous new environment.
  • Created and executive-produced by Sudip Sharma, the series is backed by Clean Slate Filmz Production.
  • Season 1 received widespread acclaim for its gripping narrative and portrayal of societal issues.
“The overwhelming response to the first season... has been a privilege, and together we’ve elevated this drama to new heights,” said Sudip Sharma, creator and showrunner.

The second season aims to raise the stakes with a darker and more immersive storyline, further enriching the show's narrative depth.

item.title: AP Dhillon's rumoured girlfriend Banita Sandhu vibes at Diljit Dosanjh's Mumbai concert amid singers' feud. Watch - Hindustan Times
item.description:
AP Dhillon's rumoured girlfriend Banita Sandhu vibes at Diljit Dosanjh's Mumbai concert amid singers' feud. Watch

Published on: Dec 23, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Banita Sandhu, who is rumoured to be dating Punjabi singer AP Dhillon, was recently seen enjoying Diljit Dosanjh's Mumbai concert, sparking reactions amid an ongoing feud between the two singers.

  • Banita Sandhu was spotted at Diljit Dosanjh's concert on December 19, 2024, at Mahalaxmi Race Course.
  • The concert attendance comes amid a public dispute between Diljit and AP Dhillon, who claimed to have been blocked by Diljit on Instagram.
  • Despite speculation about their relationship, Banita was absent from AP Dhillon's concert on December 7, leading to breakup rumors.
  • Banita starred in AP Dhillon's song 'With You' and has also been seen supporting him at events.
  • In June 2024, Banita made her debut in the popular Netflix series 'Bridgerton'.
“This is interesting, especially after the recent claims and social media exchanges between the singers.”

In conclusion, Banita Sandhu's appearance at Diljit Dosanjh's concert has stirred conversations about her rumored relationship with AP Dhillon and the ongoing feud between the two singers.

item.title: Row Over Congress Link To Allu Arjun House Attack, All 6 Arrested Get Bail - News18
item.description: No summary available for this article. Click the link to read more.

item.title: Row Over Congress Link To Allu Arjun House Attack, All 6 Protesters Held Get Bail - News18
item.description:
Congress Link to Allu Arjun House Attack: All Arrested Granted Bail

Date: December 23, 2024 | Source: News18

Protests erupted at actor Allu Arjun's residence in Hyderabad after a woman died during a stampede at the screening of his film 'Pushpa 2'. Six individuals were arrested for vandalism but were granted bail soon after.

  • Protesters vandalized Allu Arjun's house demanding compensation for the deceased woman's family.
  • Advocate Ramdas claimed the arrested were demonstrating peacefully when confronted by police.
  • BJP accused Congress of state-sponsored terrorism in relation to the incident.
  • Chief Minister condemned the vandalism and directed law enforcement to maintain order.
  • Allu Arjun was reportedly not at home during the incident.
  • Further investigations are ongoing regarding potential links to political organizations.
“The students of Osmania University were demonstrating peacefully. When the police force attacked them they acted in their self-defence.” — Advocate Ramdas

This incident reflects underlying tensions between political factions and highlights the challenges surrounding public safety during large-scale events.

item.title: Kumar Vishwas’ jibe at Shatrughan Sinha, Sonakshi Sinha’s interfaith marriage: ‘Your house is named Ramayana, someone took Lakshmi away’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Kumar Vishwas’ jibe at Shatrughan Sinha, Sonakshi Sinha’s interfaith marriage: ‘Your house is named Ramayana, someone took Lakshmi away’

Publication Date: December 22, 2024 Source: The Indian Express

Kumar Vishwas has made controversial remarks about Shatrughan Sinha and Sonakshi Sinha, referencing her interfaith marriage during a poetry event. He criticized the Sinha family while highlighting the irony of their residence being named after the Ramayana.

  • Kumar Vishwas indirectly addressed Sonakshi’s marriage to Zaheer Iqbal at a poetry event in Meerut.
  • He suggested that parents should impart values from the Ramayana to their children.
  • His comments were perceived as misogynistic, leading to criticism on social media.
“Apne bachhon ko Ramayan padhwayi aur Geeta sunwayi...”

This incident is not isolated, as Mukesh Khanna has previously criticized Shatrughan Sinha for not adequately teaching his children about Indian culture.

item.title: Shantanu Maheshwari on making his Bengali debut with Chaalchitro: I am doing something for the place I come from - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Shantanu Maheshwari on making his Bengali debut with Chaalchitro: I am doing something for the place I come from

Published on: Dec 23, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

Shantanu Maheshwari discusses his debut in Bengali cinema with Chaalchitro, the success of Campus Beats, and his thoughts on the performance of Auron Mein Kahan Dum Tha. He expresses his emotions about performing in front of a Kolkata audience and reflects on his experiences throughout the year.

  • Shantanu Maheshwari has made his debut in Bengali cinema with Chaalchitro.
  • He has also had success with the OTT series Campus Beats, which has garnered a dedicated fan base.
  • Maheshwari expresses nervousness about how Kolkata audiences will receive his performance.
  • The actor acknowledges the disappointment regarding Auron Mein Kahan Dum Tha but is satisfied with his performance feedback.
“I am happy that I am getting to do something for the audience of the place where I come from. It’s my first regional cinema and it’s where I come from. So, it’s something that I am proud of.” - Shantanu Maheshwari

In conclusion, Maheshwari's experiences reflect the challenges and triumphs of an actor seeking to connect with his roots while navigating the competitive landscape of cinema.

item.title: Kumar Vishwas's veiled ‘Ramayana’ dig at Shatrughan, Sonakshi Sinha sparks row - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Kumar Vishwas's Veiled Remarks at Shatrughan Sinha Spark Controversy

Published on: Dec 23, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Kumar Vishwas has faced backlash for his remarks at a poetry event in Uttar Pradesh, suggesting implications about actor Sonakshi Sinha's recent marriage and her father, Shatrughan Sinha.

  • Kumar Vishwas, on Dec 23, made comments that seemed to target Shatrughan and Sonakshi Sinha.
  • Vishwas's comments drew parallels to their home named 'Ramayana' and suggested interference in one's household.
  • His remarks went viral, leading to criticism from netizens and political figures.
  • Congress leader Supriya Shrinate condemned Vishwas's comments, labeling them as lewd and disrespectful towards women.
  • Vishwas alluded to the importance of educating children about the Ramayana amidst discussions on marital choices.
  • Previous controversy involving Mukesh Khanna and the Sinha family reignited due to Vishwas's statements.
“Your words 'otherwise someone will take away the Shrilakshmi of your house.' Is a girl some kind of thing that someone can take away somewhere?” - Supriya Shrinate

The controversy surrounding Kumar Vishwas's remarks highlights ongoing societal debates about gender roles and public commentary on private lives.

item.title: Radhika Merchant Ambani just redefined modern bridal fashion with innovative mangalsutra styling - The Times of India
item.description:
Radhika Merchant Ambani Redefines Modern Bridal Fashion with Innovative Mangalsutra Styling

Date: December 22, 2024 | Source: Times of India

Radhika Merchant Ambani has established herself as a style icon for modern brides, seamlessly blending tradition with contemporary fashion.

  • Radhika continues to shine with her bridal glow months after her wedding.
  • At the NMACC Arts Cafe preview night, she wore a striking black floral gown, accentuated by chic accessories.
  • Radhika's innovative styling includes wearing her mangalsutra as a bracelet, showcasing a modern twist on tradition.
  • Her minimalistic makeup and simple hairstyle enhance her chic appearance.
  • Radhika represents a new trend for brides to embrace and reinterpret traditional symbols in fashionable ways.
“Radhika has redefined how modern brides can embrace tradition in a stylish, innovative way.”

In conclusion, Radhika Merchant Ambani's fresh approach to bridal fashion highlights the harmonious blend of modernity and tradition, inspiring brides everywhere to rethink their wedding attire.

item.title: Justin Baldoni ‘sought refuge’ with porn to deal with pain: Old interview resurfaces amid Blake Lively complaint - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Justin Baldoni ‘sought refuge’ with porn to deal with pain

Date: Dec 23, 2024 10:38 AM IST | Source: Hindustan Times

Justin Baldoni's admission of his porn addiction resurfaces amid allegations from Blake Lively regarding his inappropriate behavior on set.

  • An old podcast interview revealed Baldoni's struggles with porn addiction, dating back to his childhood.
  • Baldoni discussed how porn provided an escape during difficult moments in his life.
  • Blake Lively has filed a lawsuit accusing Baldoni of harassment and creating a toxic work environment.
  • The actor's lawyer denies the allegations, calling them false and malicious.
“I trained my brain to deal with pain with the dopamine hit… But it doesn’t mean that I’m not using something in an unhealthy way.”

This situation highlights the growing scrutiny surrounding workplace behavior in Hollywood, especially in light of current allegations against Baldoni.

item.title: Baby John Box Office Day 1 Advance Booking (2 Days To Go): Sells 18K+ Tickets In 24 Hours, Varun Dhawan Starrer Needs To Pace Up To Sustain Pushpa 2 Storm - Koimoi
item.description:
Baby John Box Office Day 1 Advance Booking (2 Days To Go): Sells 18K+ Tickets In 24 Hours, Varun Dhawan Starred

Publication Date: December 23, 2024

Source: Koimoi

Varun Dhawan's latest action thriller, Baby John, is set to release on December 25, which coincides with the Christmas holiday. Initial advance ticket sales have shown promising numbers after day one of booking.

  • Advance booking began on December 22 at 10 a.m. IST.
  • 18,200 tickets sold in the first 24 hours across various cinema chains.
  • Estimated gross earnings amount to 59 lakh INR from advance sales.
  • Delhi-NCR leads in pre-sales with 15 lakh gross, followed by Mumbai with 10 lakh.
  • Total shows listed have increased to around 3,500.
“Considering the film is a holiday release, it must pick up the pace from today itself.”

Overall, the anticipation for Baby John is building up as it approaches its release date, and ticket sales will be crucial for its success.

item.title: Sai Pallavi visits Kashi Vishwanath temple - Greatandhra
item.description:
Sai Pallavi Visits Kashi Vishwanath Temple

Publication Date: Not specified   |   Source: Not specified

Actress Sai Pallavi visited the Kashi Vishwanath Temple in Varanasi and participated in the Ganga aarti. This visit comes amid a controversy regarding her comments on the Indian Army.

  • Sai Pallavi will star alongside Ranbir Kapoor in the upcoming film ‘Ramayan’.
  • She addressed the perspectives regarding the Indian Army, emphasizing varied opinions based on national allegiance.
  • Fans have defended her on social media amidst criticism for her comments.
  • Her upcoming film, ‘Thandel’, is also in production.
“People in Pakistan think our army is a terrorist group. But for us, it is them. So, the perspective changes.” - Sai Pallavi

This visit highlights the duality of public perception and the strong emotional responses associated with national pride and identity.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Worldwide box office collection Day 18: Allu Arjun film enters Rs 1600 cr club; chases Baahubali 2 and Dangal global numbers next - The Indian Express
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Worldwide box office collection Day 18: Allu Arjun film enters Rs 1600 cr club; chases Baahubali 2 and Dangal global numbers next

Date: December 20, 2024 | Source: Indian Express

Pushpa 2 has continued its remarkable box office success, entering the Rs 1600 crore club globally following a record-breaking weekend performance.

  • Pushpa 2 has grossed Rs 72.3 crore in its third weekend.
  • The film has surpassed Baahubali 2's domestic collection record, earning Rs 1062.9 crore.
  • Pushpa 2 has crossed Rs 1500 crore globally and is now chasing records from Dangal and Baahubali 2.
  • The Hindi version contributed 80% of the third weekend's total collection.
“What has been truly impressive about this golden run of Pushpa 2 is the gap in the numbers made in the original Telugu version and the dubbed Hindi version.”

The film's success is juxtaposed with off-screen challenges faced by Allu Arjun, including a tragic incident linked to a theater showing.

item.title: AP Dhillon fires another shot at Diljit Dosanjh, Badshah urges for ‘unity’: ‘Don’t make the mistakes that…’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Badshah Urges Unity Among Punjabi Artistes Amidst AP Dhillon and Diljit Dosanjh Feud

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: Indian Express

Punjabi singers AP Dhillon and Diljit Dosanjh have been trending globally due to their music, but tensions have surfaced between them. During a recent concert, AP revealed on social media that Diljit had blocked him, to which Diljit responded by denying any discord. In the midst of this feud, rapper Badshah has called for unity among the artists.

  • AP Dhillon accused Diljit of blocking him on social media.
  • Diljit denied the claim and emphasized no issues exist between them.
  • Badshah commented on the feud, urging both to stay united in their music careers.
  • AP Dhillon's concert response included a request for Diljit to unblock him on Instagram.
“Please don’t make the mistakes that we made. The world is ours for the taking. Like they say, ‘If you wanna go fast, go alone, but if you wanna go far, go together.’ United we stand.” - Badshah

The ongoing tension reflects not just personal disagreements but highlights the dynamics of collaboration in the Punjabi music industry.

item.title: Game Changer team heads back to India after successful Dallas event - 123telugu
item.description:
Game Changer Team Returns to India After Successful Dallas Event

Published on Dec 23, 2024 by Latest Telugu cinema news

The team behind the much-anticipated movie 'Game Changer' has returned to India after a successful pre-release event in Dallas, which attracted a larger audience than expected and significantly boosted the team's confidence.

  • Global star Ram Charan stars in the political drama 'Game Changer', directed by Shankar Shanmugam.
  • The Dallas event featured a great turnout and was a resounding success, leading to excitement about the film's release.
  • The producers and cast are currently planning more promotional activities to engage audiences across India.
  • The film boasts a stellar cast including Kiara Advani, Srikanth, Anjali, and music by Thaman.
“The event has significantly boosted the confidence of the makers, and the team is now planning more exciting events to engage with audiences nationwide.”

This event marks a pivotal moment for the 'Game Changer' team, highlighting the enthusiasm for the film and their commitment to connecting with fans across the country.

item.title: Allu Arjun's Kids Allu Arha, Allu Ayaan Forced To Leave Home After Protestors Vandalise Home | Watch - News18
item.description:
Allu Arjun's Kids Allu Arha, Allu Ayaan Forced To Leave Home After Protestors Vandalise Home | Watch

Date: December 23, 2024

Source: News18

Allu Arjun’s children, Allu Arha and Allu Ayaan, were forced to leave their Hyderabad home after it was vandalised by protesters demanding justice for a woman who died during a stampede.

  • Protesters, part of the Osmania University Joint Action Committee, vandalised the property on Sunday.
  • A video captured the children leaving in a car as media surrounded them, showing a worried Arha.
  • Allu Arjun’s father condemned the attack and stated that the law will take its course.
  • Six individuals were arrested connected to the protest.
  • The vandalism is linked to recent tensions following a stampede at Sandhya Theatre during a film premiere.
Allu Aravind stated, “Now is not the right time for us to react to anything.”

The incident highlights growing tensions surrounding public events and the responsibilities of individuals involved in such gatherings.

item.description: No summary available for this article. Click the link to read more.

item.title: Allu Arjun’s Hyderabad home attacked amid Pushpa 2 stampede controversy; father Allu Arvind BREAKS SILENCE - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
Allu Arjun’s Home Vandalized Amid Pushpa 2 Controversy

Publication Date: December 22, 2024 Source: Bollywood Hungama

On Sunday, tensions escalated in Hyderabad when protesters vandalized actor Allu Arjun's residence following a tragic stampede incident during a benefit show for Pushpa 2: The Rule.

  • Protestors demanded justice after the stampede resulted in the death of a woman, Revathi, and serious injuries to her son, Sri Tej.
  • Videos showed protesters breaking flower pots and clashing with security personnel.
  • Five individuals have been detained by the police for their involvement in the vandalism.
  • Allu Arjun's father, Allu Arvind, condemned the violent actions and called for restraint.
  • Following the initial incident that occurred on December 4th, Allu Arjun faced legal challenges, including an arrest.
"The police have taken in the offenders and filed a case against them. No one should encourage incidents like these." - Allu Arvind

Allu Arjun has committed to covering medical expenses for Sri Tej but is currently refraining from meeting the family due to ongoing investigations.
